DX Archive unpacker.

==Requirements==

.NET 2.0 or later

==Instructions==

--GUI--

Double-click DXExtract.exe to open a GUI.
Drag an archive onto it to open it

In the File menu, you can export the entire archive

You can also Save a decrypted version of the archive somewhere
(this was just for testing) but might be useful.

--Command-line--

Drag and drop archives over the DXExtract.exe to unpack them.
They will be extracted into a folder with the same name as the
archive (withou the extension)

Hime Works
